content.rendered: Mathilda Haglund is a senior associate in the firm’s Mergers and Acquisitions practice group, focusing on acquisitions and divestments across multiple industries. She regularly advises clients on strategic partnerships and investments, carve-outs and separations, technology-focused transactions and post-closing integrations. Prior to joining the M&A practice group, Mathilda spent several years in the Corporate, Tech and Intellectual Property practice group, and has extensive experience in transformation and digitalization projects, strategic and innovative joint ventures and procurements, as well as outsourcing agreements and other types of complex commercial agreements.
